isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE (with R-134a Refrigerant System) - TROUBLESHOOTING - CLUTCH DOES NOT ENGAGE

svcproc.title: CLUTCH DOES NOT ENGAGE
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 33 for a general procedure to troubleshoot the 'CLUTCH DOES NOT ENGAGE' problem.

For detailed information and troubleshooting on electrical circuits, refer to the Group 8 ELECTRICAL CIRCUIT DIAGRAMS; ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE; and/or HEATING, VENTILATION AND AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC) TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE, in the MASTER SERVICE MANUAL, for the vehicle being serviced.

figure.caption: Figure 33. Clutch Does Not Engage Troubleshooting Chart
